#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

bool prime[5000001] = {1, 1};

void getPrimes() {
    for (int i=3 ; i<=1666667; i+=2)
        if (prime[i]==0)
            for (int j=i+i+i ; j<=5000000 ; j+=i+i)
                prime[j]=1;
}

long long PrimeRange (int m, int n) {
    long long ans=0;
    if (m<=2)
        ans+=2;
    m = (m%2==0 ? m+1 : m);
    for (int i=m ; i<=n ; i+=2)
        if (!prime[i])
            ans+=i;
    return ans;
}

main() {
    int t;

    cin >> t;

    getPrimes();
    while (t--) {
        int m, n;
        cin >> m >> n;
        cout << PrimeRange (m, n) << endl;
    }
}
